en_US.project_summary: Lend, borrow & trade with Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Tether (USDT) and other major cryptocurrencies. Buy & sell crypto and earn interest of up to 11.57% APY. Trade while continuing to earn high interest rates.

zh_CN.project_summary: 借贷和交易比特币（BTC）、以太坊（ETH）、泰达币（USDT）和其他主要加密货币。购买和出售加密货币，获得高达11.57% APY的利息。在继续获得高利率的同时进行交易。
